## HelpersFromExtensions type

Utility type which receives an extension and provides the type of helpers it makes available.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HelpersFromExtensions<GExtension extends AnyExtension> = UnionToIntersection<MapHelpers<GExtension['_H']>>;
```
